step_one.title: Download Dim3ak
step_one.description: Enter your phone number and confirm it using the code.

step_two.title: Add your packages
step_two.description: Add your packages by providing the necessary information such as weight, images, and shipping addresses of origin and destination.

step_three.title: Find the best deals
step_three.description: Wait to receive competitive offers from our partner carriers or explore the available deals.

step_four.title: Negotiate the prices
step_four.description: Negotiate the prices directly from our application.

step_five.title: Hand over your package with confidence
step_five.description: Meet the carrier in person to hand over your package with peace of mind. Our application offers a unique confirmation code system: simply scan the carrier's code to confirm the delivery of your package.
